text: phir hamane un nabiyon ke pashchaat maryam ke putr eesa ko bheja, use sach bataane vaala, jo usake saamane tauraat thee tatha use injeel pradaan kee, jisamen maargadarshan tatha prakaash hai, use sach bataane vaalee, jo usake aage tauraat thee tatha allaah se darane vaalon ke lie sarvatha maargadarshan tatha shiksha thee
